results.title: Effects of fibric acid derivatives and metformin on postprandial lipemia.
results.text_hl: In conclusion @CHEMICAL_Gemfibrozil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015248 @@@gemfibrozil@@@, @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@bezafibrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were shown to be beneficial in the clearance of @GENE_PPL @GENE_5493 @@@PPLp@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemic_Waist</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064250 @@@hypertriglyceridemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, subjects with isolated low HDL-C levels and nondiabetic @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ intolerant subjects, respectively.

citations.NLM: Weintraub MS, Charach G, Grosskopf I. Effects of fibric acid derivatives and metformin on postprandial lipemia. Atherosclerosis. 1998 Dec;141 Suppl 1():S71-5. PMID: 9888646
citations.BibTeX: @article{9888646, title={Effects of fibric acid derivatives and metformin on postprandial lipemia.}, author={Weintraub MS and Charach G and Grosskopf I}, journal={Atherosclerosis}, volume={141 Suppl 1}, pages={S71-5}}

results.title: Pharmacological control of hypertriglyceridemia.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_fibric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C010285 @@@Fibric acid@@@ derivatives and @CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@nicotinic acid@@@ (and its derivatives) are the drugs of choice when treating @<m>DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemic_Waist</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064250 @@@hypertriglyceridemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@; @CHEMICAL_Fatty_Acids_Omega_3 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015525 @@@n-3 fatty acids@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Fish_Oils @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005395 @@@fish oil@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (especially in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@) represent additional therapeutic agents.

citations.NLM: Franceschini G, Paoletti R. Pharmacological control of hypertriglyceridemia. Cardiovasc Drugs Ther. 1993 Jun;7(3):297-302. PMID: 8364001
citations.BibTeX: @article{8364001, title={Pharmacological control of hypertriglyceridemia.}, author={Franceschini G and Paoletti R}, journal={Cardiovasc Drugs Ther}, volume={7}, number={3}, pages={297-302}}
